      • getContainer

        @Nullable
public net.minecraft.inventory.Container getContainer()

      • getSize

        public int getSize()

        Gets the total size of the Inventory. The player's inventory size is 36, 27 for the main inventory, plus 9 for the hotbar. A single chest's size would be 63, because it also counts the player's inventory.

        Returns:
        the size of the Inventory

      • getStackInSlot

        @NotNull
public Item getStackInSlot(int slot)

        Gets the item in any slot, starting from 0.

        Parameters:
        slot - the slot index
        Returns:
        the Item in that slot

      • getWindowId

        public int getWindowId()

        Returns the window identifier number of this Inventory. This Inventory must be backed by a Container {@link #isContainer()}

        Returns:
        the window id

      • doAction

        public void doAction(@NotNull
                     Action action)

      • isItemValidForSlot

        public boolean isItemValidForSlot(int slot,
                                  @NotNull
                                  Item item)

        Checks if an item can be shift clicked into a certain slot, i.e coal into the bottom of a furnace.

        Parameters:
        slot - the slot index
        item - the item for checking
        Returns:
        whether or not it can be shift clicked in

        @NotNull
public java.util.List<com.chattriggers.ctjs.minecraft.wrappers.objects.inventory.Item> getItems()

        a list of the class Items in an inventory

      • contains

        public boolean contains(@NotNull
                        Item item)

        Checks whether the inventory contains the given item.

        Parameters:
        item - the item to check for
        Returns:
        whether or not the inventory contains the item

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int id)

        Checks whether the inventory contains an item with ID.

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the item to match

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf(@NotNull
                   Item item)

        Gets the index of any item in the inventory, and returns the slot number. Returns -1 if the inventory does not contain the item.

        Parameters:
        item - the item to check for
        Returns:
        the index of the given item

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf(int id)

        Gets the index of any item in the inventory with matching ID, and returns the slot number. Returns -1 if the inventory does not contain the item.

        Parameters:
        id - the item ID to check for
        Returns:
        the index of the given item with ID

      • isContainer

        public boolean isContainer()

        Returns true if this Inventory wraps a Container object rather than an IInventory object

        Returns:
        if this is a container

      • click

        @JvmOverloads
 @NotNull
public Inventory click(int slot,
                                               boolean shift,
                                               @NotNull
                                               java.lang.String button)

        Shorthand for {@link ClickAction}

        Parameters:
        slot - the slot to click on
        shift - whether shift is being held. False by default
        button - the mouse button to use. "LEFT" by default.
        Returns:
        this inventory for method chaining

        type - what click type this should be: LEFT, MIDDLE, RIGHT
        slots - all of the slots to drag onto

        this inventory for method chaining
